title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season04 DVDrip AVC AC3
description:
Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season04 DVDrip AVC AC3

UPDATED WITH THE SHOUT VERSION OF 424 MANOS THE HANDS OF FATE
The Shout version of Manos has better cropping, no edge jaggies in segments, a slightly lighter transfer, and is slightly longer.

The goal of these AVC encodes is to reproduce the same picture as seen when viewing the DVD but with a smaller file size. This means there was no cropping so you may see small black bars around the picture's edge. This is exactly what is seen on the DVD source. The problem with cropping MST3Ks is that cropping based on the movie usually over-crops the SOL segments, sometimes a lot. Plus, automatically cropping can pull the picture out of its correct aspect ratio. So these encodes have no cropping, RF=20 constant quality video and AC3 passthru so the audio is identical to the DVD.

Handbrake 0.10.1.6962 20150308

Video: AVC encode
Width 720, Anamorphic Loose, Copping Manual 0 0 0 0
Deinterlace=Slower
FPS 29.97 Constant, Preset=Very Slow, Quality RF=20.0
Audio: AC3 Passthru 192Kbps

Single releases are RHINO
Vol01 to Vol12 are RHINO
Vol13+ are SHOUT
titles with subs have them set off by default
all titles have chapters

Big thanks to the online MST3K community for the DVD sources, some of which are out of print or hard to find. And to the one online member in particular who made this possible: thank you!!!

If these encodes were enjoyable, you don't have the original discs and you can afford them, please consider picking up some the official MST3K DVDs. The artwork, packaging, menus and extras with the DVDs are fantastic.
